acf.title: Former Federal District Court Judge and Former Director of the FBI
acf.bio_copy: Louis J. Freeh is currently Vice Chairman and Managing Director with AlixPartners. Previously, Louie was founder and Managing Partner of the law firm, Freeh Sporkin Sullivan and founder and Chairman of Freeh Group International Solutions, a consulting firm. Prior to that, Louie was a Partner at Pepper Hamilton. Louie previously served as Vice Chairman, General Counsel, Corporate Secretary and Ethics Officer to MBNA Corporation, a bank holding company. He served as Director of the FBI from 1993 to 2001 and previously as a U.S. District Judge, Assistant U.S. Attorney and FBI Special Agent. Louie also served as a U.S. JAG Corps Army Officer. He has served as court-appointed monitor for Daimler AG, and as the Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Trustee for MF Global Holdings. Louie is also a past board member of the U.S. Naval Academy Foundation.
